title: $Bubble_
author: $Bubble_
content: this project is for you if you are a trader Bubblebot provides a comprehensive suite of features within a single Telegram bot, including spot trading, futures trading, multi-token staking, and hedging/risk management for various crypto assets. This all-in-one platform aims to offer a convenient and versatile experience for cryptocurrency enthusiasts and traders.Exclusive FeaturesBubbleBot provides an extensive set of features crafted to enhance your chances of success.Straightforward Structure for Margin-Based Short-Term SpeculationDaily 36 hour Closure Ensured with Guaranteed $USDC/ETH SettlementMulti-Token StakingHedge/Risk ProtocolFinal Settlement Aligned with the Underlying Asset Price Oracle at ExpirationAbsence of day trading funding paymentsLimit ordersMirror Sniper BotToken ScannerOpen for Creation by Any User, for Any Asset, Assuming Availability of an On-Chain Oracle for Underlying Asset Price ReferenceBorrowing/Lending options for Shorting the Underlying AssetRevenue Share ModelReferral ProgramWebsite: https://bubblebot.finance/Medium: https://bubblebot.medium.com/Twitter: https://twitter.com/teamBubblebotTelegram: https://t.me/teamBubblebot

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: You may have good intentions toward your project but one thing I don't and won't encourage is to explore a trading tools to help trades for beginners. Naturally this could help for someone people but to me I see no reason one should used a bot for trading what if the bot malfunction what would be their benefits and what solution would you offer to those who starts making use of the bot after incuring huge lost with little technical issues on the bot. As beginner who is venturing into trading aren't encourage to start using bot at present moment rather should build themselves and understand the some fundamental principles of trading before exploring additional measures to guide and monitor trades.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: Adbitco on September 20, 2023, 02:52:20 PMNaturally this could help for someone people but to me I see no reason one should used a bot for trading what if the bot malfunction what would be their benefits and what solution would you offer to those who starts making use of the bot after incuring huge lost with little technical issues on the bot.Just ignore the OP. They've been spamming the forum upon registration with their portended services. Here's a classical example why it was canvassed some time ago that newbies shouldn't be allowed to post in certain boards. It's obvious OP is only keen on luring users to their social media platforms rather than prove the potency of their trading acumen to us here. OP forgot that the only way they can get anyone's attention is if they actually put up results over time for all to see before attempting to lure them out of here. Nothing convinces more convincingly like results.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Quote from: Mpamaegbu on September 23, 2023, 04:10:10 PMQuote from: Adbitco on September 20, 2023, 02:52:20 PMNaturally this could help for someone people but to me I see no reason one should used a bot for trading what if the bot malfunction what would be their benefits and what solution would you offer to those who starts making use of the bot after incuring huge lost with little technical issues on the bot.Just ignore the OP. They've been spamming the forum upon registration with their portended services. Here's a classical example why it was canvassed some time ago that newbies shouldn't be allowed to post in certain boards. It's obvious OP is only keen on luring users to their social media platforms rather than prove the potency of their trading acumen to us here. OP forgot that the only way they can get anyone's attention is if they actually put up results over time for all to see before attempting to lure them out of here. Nothing convinces more convincingly like results. Results or not, gullible newbies can still fall victim to cheap scams like this one. There is this belief that trading is the best and quicker way to make good money in crypto especially during bear season when the market doesn't bring back much returns. Desperate investors will unintentionally seek out scams like this one in the bid to make fast returns, trading is a difficult act and making good money out of trading takes years of practice, but the short-term investors of these days want everything to happen faster than designated time hence it won't be a surprising thing to see some newbies fall victims.

Beginners have to go on a normal process where they will start learn about trading and if they are already knowledgeable about the market then using bot might be a good option especially if they are too busy to trade. The project looks interesting though, its just that the risk are high in trading.

comments.author: kentrolla
comments.body: I don't have anything against your project but the way you have posted same stuff twice in a row is something doesn't seem right and I would rather suggest you to back your claim with proof and then make similar posts whic will make sense and help others as well. This might be genuine as well but nowadays it's very difficult to trust such projects and tools and I personally had negative experience in not trading.

comments.author: Yamifoud
comments.body: What you can do to make someone think that trading is easy when they are really suffering difficulties in understanding the market's volatility?Can you assure OP that this project will help them even if they lack of trading experience and knowledge? I'm not sure nor I don't think this would help them because they need to become a good trader first before making this bot project run efficiently.  Even if you will say that they working well on your end but these bots works depending on its command and that is a problem if you don't have deep knowledge about trading as it will still fail.

comments.author: asriloni
comments.body: Fuck off with all of your alts. Your platform was just a horrible platform. You can start to spam. Marked your platform as a garbage platform to be used. It's even terrible to watch it. How many alts used to shilling your garbage platform. Bubblebot financie is probably 99% scam. Spamming with bunch of your alts will not help you.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Since your bot is in the Presale Whitelist stage, are there demo versions to test the idea, or at least testnet coin, so that the trader can test whether the options presented are executable ideas or promises?I am interested in the Hedge/Risk Protocol. What is this protocol and how does it work? Are these percentages chosen by the user or are they automated so that the user cannot modify them?On which exchange is it supported?
